name: Supernatural Sleepover
description:
This holiday season, battle for a child's love in Supernatural Sleepover. Team up and fight as (or against) Santa Claus, The Easter Bunny, Cupid, or The Tooth Fairy for the love of a child. Supernatural Sleepover is a local multiplayer party game for four people to be played in teams of two. It is ideally played with an XBox 360 or PS controller.

CHARACTERS
Santa Claus: This jolly old man is a melee-style fighter that's slow to start but packs a large punch.
Special Attack!
Santa harnesses the power and speed of Rudolph and charges like a reindeer. Watch out if he comes barreling towards you!

The Easter Bunny: Armed with a powerful kick, the hind legs of this rabbit are deadly weapons.
Special Attack!
The Easter Bunny's kick is no match for the magical rainbow leap that will launch this rabbit into the sky.

Cupid: The mischievous archer is back with his bow and arrow to wreak some havoc.
Special Attack!
Cupid's got to spread some love and what better way to do so than to fly high?

The Tooth Fairy: As a ranged fighter, the Tooth Fairy's wand shoots shoots far and may hit a few in between.
Special Attack!
Now you see her, now you don't! The Tooth Fairy gains invisibility for a couple of seconds, so don't let her out of your sight.

Brought to you by: Fay Koh, Andy Liu, Mila Mikhitarova, Samir Mohamed
